Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
AboutDialogRepresents a modal About dialog in the application showing version and author information
ApplicationThe main application class
Callback< T >Using this Callback class you can seamlessly bridge C style callback functions with C++ method calls
Callback1< T, P1 >This callback class represents the same form of callback functionality as Callback, but with an added parameter that can be passed around
FeedPanelRepresents the listbox where TwitterStatus items are displayed of a specific TwitterFeed object (one at a time)
FilteredIteratorIterates over TwitterStatus items with filtering options
HttpClientSubclasses the wxHTTP HTTP library to make a slightly more programmer friendly HTTP client
ImagePreviewDialogPreviews an image and allows the user to upload it with the Twitpic API, returning a URL location to the uploaded image
IsgdImplementation of http://is.gd API which allows shortening of URLs
LoginPanelImplements a login window whereby the user can enter account information and have it remembered
MainPanelThe main panel after the user logs into the application
MainWindowRepresents the main window of the application
MultipartImplements multipart/form-data for HttpClient
OptionsDialogAllows user to modify application settings
Serializer< S, T >Basic interface to perform serialization on an object to any output
Serializer< wxString, TwitterFeed >Serializes a TwitterFeed object using XML documents
SettingsRepresents a map of all application settings in memory which can be loaded from or saved to an XML document
StaticUrlTextRepresents an static text control that is clickable as a URL
StatusTextCtrlRepresents a specialized editbox control that shows a label when the control is not focused (and there is no data in the editbox)
ThreadCallback< T >A version of Callback but encapsulated into a thread which automatically performs the callback on its Entry function
ThreadCallback1< T, P1 >A version of Callback1 but encapsulated into a thread which automatically performs the callback on its Entry function
TrayIconRepresents an icon located in the system tray
TwitPicImplements the TwitPic image uploading service API
TwitterThe heart and soul of Twittle, implementing the Twitter API
TwitterFeedRepresents a collection of TwitterStatus updates from a resource name (part of a URL)
TwitterStatusRepresents a status update from a Twitter user
TwitterUpdateListenerAn interface for the observer pattern used by Twitter to notify listeners of Twitter updates
TwitterUserRepresents a Twitter user
wxThread
